T02D2523:132b-3: rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga / bcom ldan 'das
T02D2523:132b-4: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo
T02D2523:132b-5: // nyes pa kun dang rnam bral zhing //
T02D2523:132b-6: sems can kun la phan bzhed pa //
T02D2523:132b-7: rtag tu dngos po kun rtag 'gyur //
T02D2523:132b-8: rdo rje sems la phyag 'tshal nas //
T02D2523:132b-9: ji ltar sku gzugs la sogs kyi //
T02D2523:132b-10: rab gnas rgyas par bshad par bya //
T02D2523:132b-11: rdor 'dzin chen por dbang bskur ba'i //
T02D2523:132b-12: slob dpon mtshan nyid kun ldan pas //
T02D2523:132b-13: rigs lnga'i rab gnas bya'o zhes //
T02D2523:132b-14: rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs pas na //
T02D2523:132b-15: de la slob dpon mtshan nyid ni //
T02D2523:132b-16: brtan zhing dul la blo gros ldan //
T02D2523:132b-17: bzod ldan drang la g-yo sgyu med //
T02D2523:133a-3: de nyid bcu ni yongs su shes //
T02D2523:133a-4: de dag dang ldan slob dpon te //
T02D2523:133a-5: de la de nyid bcu po ni //
T02D2523:133a-6: dkyil 'khor dang ni ting 'dzin mchog / phyag rgya stang stabs dag dang ni //
T02D2523:133a-7: bzlas brjod sbyin sreg de nyid mchod//
T02D2523:133a-8: las dang sbyor ba nyer bsdu ba //
T02D2523:133a-9: de nyid bcu zhes yongs su grags //
T02D2523:133a-10: de la dang por re zhig sngags pa blo dang ldan pa rnams kyis /
T02D2523:133a-13: gza' dang nyi ma bzang po yongs su shes par byas la /
T02D2523:133a-16: ba dan la sogs pas gnas brgyan par bya zhing /
T02D2523:133a-17: ba'i rnam la lnga la sogs pa la /
T02D2523:133a-18: rdo rje gnod sbyin yongs su bzlas pas /
T02D2523:133a-19: gnas dang dkyil 'khor nye bar byug par bya'o //
T02D2523:133a-21: de'i 'og tu rang nyid chu dang dril la sogs pas khrus legs par byas la /
T02D2523:133a-22: rgyan btags te cho ga thams cad yongs su spyad par bya ba ste /
T02D2523:133a-23: de la dang por rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis bgegs
T02D2523:133a-24: gzhom pa la sogs pa dang gzhal yas khang dang
T02D2523:133a-25: gdan la sogs pa ji lta ba bzhin du byas
T02D2523:133a-26: la // 'di ltar yid la 'thad pa'i khrus sa'i stegs bu brtsig par bya ba ni /
T02D2523:133a-27: zur bzhi pa la gru bzhi pa'am //
T02D2523:133a-28: khru gang tsam gyi tshad tsam ni //
T02D2523:133a-29: med na legs par bri bar bya //
T02D2523:133a-30: de ltar phyogs dang mtshams su mtshan ma bris pa'i bum pa brgyad gzhag par bya ste /
T02D2523:133a-32: rdo rje me tog la sogs pa bris la /
T02D2523:133a-33: phyogs dang mtshams su gzhag par bya zhing /
T02D2523:133a-34: dbus su ni rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa rigs lnga'i mtshan mas mtshan pa bzhag la /
T02D2523:133a-35: de dag gi nang du 'bru lnga dang /
T02D2523:133a-36: sman dang rin po che bcug la //
T02D2523:133a-37: dri dang sbyar ba'i chus bkang ste //
T02D2523:133a-38: gos kyis mgul pa dkri ba dang //
T02D2523:133a-39: 'dab ma dri zhim pos kha brgyan pa dang /
T02D2523:133a-42: ba dan la sogs pas mtshan par bya'o //
T02D2523:133a-43: de'i rjes la gos dang dril bu sogs pas bskor
T02D2523:133a-44: ba'i khrus kyi khang par rdo rje slob dpon gyis
T02D2523:133a-45: lha rnams khrus gsol bar bya ste /
T02D2523:133a-46: lugs ma las gzhan pa ri mo dang glegs bam la sogs pa la ni me long ngam /
T02D2523:133b-0: de bzhin @133b gshegs pa'i sku gdung la sogs pa la /
T02D2523:133b-1: de'i nang du ting nge 'dzin gyis bkug pa la bkru bar bya'o //
T02D2523:133b-2: de nas dam tshig sems dpa' la //
T02D2523:133b-3: ye shes sems dpa' rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs
T02D2523:133b-4: pa'i sngags dang phyag rgyas dgug pa la sogs pa
T02D2523:133b-5: bya'o // de nas aom a'a: h'um zhes bya ba'i yi ge gsum mam /
T02D2523:133b-6: lha de'i sa bon gyi yi ge rnam par dgod cing bsam par bya'o //
T02D2523:133b-7: de nas mchod yon dang zhabs bsil la sogs pa phul la /
T02D2523:133b-8: sarba p'a pam da ha na badzr'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2523:133b-9: zhes bya bas 'dir sbyang ba la sogs pa bya ste /
T02D2523:133b-10: de'i rjes la kun rdzob kyi lha de dang por
T02D2523:133b-11: dar ram ras dkar po gtsang ma lag bur gyis
T02D2523:133b-13: de nas de bkru ba'i 'dag chal dang /
T02D2523:133b-14: yo byad rnams ni 'di dag ste //
T02D2523:133b-15: sug pa dang ni sran phye dang //
T02D2523:133b-16: ku sha ba yi rnam lnga dang //
T02D2523:133b-17: de ltar so phag la sogs pas //
T02D2523:133b-18: khrus ni bya bar gsungs pa ste//
T02D2523:133b-19: yungs kar dang ni me dag gis //
T02D2523:133b-20: sems can kun la phan bde ba'o //
T02D2523:133b-21: sbyang ba la sogs rnams bya zhing //
T02D2523:133b-22: rgyal 'gyur bkra shis tshigs bcad gdon //
T02D2523:133b-23: yang dang yang du bstod bya zhing //
T02D2523:133b-24: rol mo'i sgra ni sna tshogs dang //
T02D2523:133b-25: ngo mtshar gyur pa'i rol mo'ang bya //
T02D2523:133b-26: las kun byed dang rigs snying dang //
T02D2523:133b-27: rang gi rigs bdag gsang sngags ni //
T02D2523:133b-28: yongs bzlas sngar bshad bum pa'i chus //
T02D2523:133b-29: mkhas pas lha rnams khrus gsol lo //
T02D2523:133b-30: de nas gtsang ba mi yis ni //
T02D2523:133b-31: las kun byed pa'i gsang sngags kyis //
T02D2523:133b-32: bzlas byas stan ni bzang po la //
T02D2523:133b-33: rigs pa rang gnas bzhugs su gsol //
T02D2523:133b-34: de nas rigs kyi bdag po'i gsang sngags dang /
T02D2523:133b-35: de bzhin du rigs kyi rig pa yongs su bzlas nas bzhugs su gsol nas /
T02D2523:133b-36: sngags pas yang rang gi gsang sngags dang //
T02D2523:133b-37: bskyed pa'i rim pas de rang gi gnas su sprul la sgo dbye ba byas te /
T02D2523:133b-39: aom badzra sa m'a ya dza: dza: dza: de nas mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod la /
T02D2523:133b-41: gsang sngags mngon par bya ste /
T02D2523:133b-43: rigs kyi bdag po'i snying po'o //
T02D2523:134a-0: aom bha ga wa ti ru ru sphu ru dzva la @134a * //
T02D2523:134a-1: tishtha singbha lo tsa ni sarba aa rtha s'a dha ne sv'a h'a /
T02D2523:134a-2: zhes bya ba ni rigs kyi yum gyi rig pa'o //
T02D2523:134a-3: aom dzi na dzi ka sv'a h'a /
T02D2523:134a-4: zhes pa ni rigs kyi snying po'o //
T02D2523:134a-6: aom sham ka re sh'intam ka re ghu ta ghu
T02D2523:134a-7: ti ni gh'u ta ya gh'a ta ya ghu ti
T02D2523:134a-8: ni sv'a h'a / aom badzra dhrik sv'a h'a /
T02D2523:134a-9: aom ka te bi ka te ni ka te ka
T02D2523:134a-10: tam ka te ka ro ta bi rye sv'a h'a
T02D2523:134a-11: / aom a'a ro li ka sv'a h'a /
T02D2523:134a-12: aom ra tna dhrik sv'a h'a /
T02D2523:134a-13: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re sv'a h'a /
T02D2523:134a-14: aom pradzny'a dhrik ces bya ba ni rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du rigs so //
T02D2523:134a-15: so so'i rig pa dang snying po'o //
T02D2523:134a-16: de nas cod pan dang dar dbyangs bcing pa dang /
T02D2523:134a-17: go cha bskon pa la sogs pa byas la /
T02D2523:134a-18: me tog la sogs pa mchod pa thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod la /
T02D2523:134a-19: yongs su bzlas pas gus pas phyag byas la mchod yon phul te /
T02D2523:134a-21: de nas phyir rol du gtor ma byin la sbyin sreg bya ste /
T02D2523:134a-22: dang por bgegs zhi bar bya ba'i sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D2523:134a-23: tshim par bya ba'i phyir ni /
T02D2523:134a-25: dgongs par bya ba'i phyir ni rigs kyi sngags kyis so //
T02D2523:134a-26: 'byor par bya ba'i don du ni rigs kyi bdag po'i snying pos bya'o //
T02D2523:134a-27: de ltar sbyin sreg byas nas /
T02D2523:134a-28: lhag par gnas par byas la /
T02D2523:134a-29: de nas mchod pa sna tshogs kyis mchod la /
T02D2523:134a-30: mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grus kyi phyir gsol ba gdab ste /
T02D2523:134a-31: gshegs su gsol bar bya ba'i phyir 'dis bskul bar bya'o //
T02D2523:134a-32: aom khyed kyis 'gro ba'i don kun mdzad //
T02D2523:134a-33: dngos grub tshul bzhin stsal lags kyis //
T02D2523:134a-34: sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang //
T02D2523:134a-35: slar yang gshegs par mdzad du gsol //
T02D2523:134a-36: de nas bsrung ba'i phyir yi ge brgya pa la lan bdun bzlas par bya'o //
T02D2523:134a-37: de nas de nyid du ku sha bting la nyal par bya //
T02D2523:134a-38: de nas mal nas langs pa dang /
T02D2523:134a-40: spos chus lus kun dang gnas kun byugs la /
T02D2523:134a-42: bgegs bskrad pa la sogs pa bya'o //
T02D2523:134a-43: de nas gzhal yas khang dang /
T02D2523:134a-44: rten la sogs pa bsams la /
T02D2523:134a-45: de'i 'og tu zangs ma'i snod la sogs par mchod
T02D2523:134b-0: pa la sogs bshams @134b te sngags kyis gdab po
T02D2523:134b-1: // de nas lha rnams dgug pa dang /
T02D2523:134b-4: dbang du byas la bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D2523:134b-5: spyan drangs nas mchod pa dang zhabs bsil la sogs pa phul te /
T02D2523:134b-6: sngar bshad pa'i rigs kyi sbyang ba byas la /
T02D2523:134b-7: de'i 'og tu d'u ra ba'i pir dang ;
T02D2523:134b-8: til mar gyi sbyang ba byas te /
T02D2523:134b-9: de'i sngags ni aom sarba ta th'a ga ta k'a ya bi sho dha ne sv'a h'a /
T02D2523:134b-10: dbang bskur ba'i cho gas khrus kyang gsol bar bya ste /
T02D2523:134b-11: ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis ni //
T02D2523:134b-12: lha rnams kyis ni khrus gsol ba //
T02D2523:134b-13: de bzhin bdag gis lha yi chus //
T02D2523:134b-14: dad pas khrus ni gsol bar bya //
T02D2523:134b-15: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi she ka ta sa ma ya shri ye h'um /
T02D2523:134b-16: de nas na bza' dbul bar bya ste /
T02D2523:134b-17: aom badzra bha sha ne sv'a h'a /
T02D2523:134b-18: de nas rgyan la sogs pa thams cad rang rang gi sngags /
T02D2523:134b-19: aom badzra mu ku ta sv'a h'a /
T02D2523:134b-20: zhes pa la sogs pas dbul bar bya'o //
T02D2523:134b-21: de'i 'og tu dbang bskur bar bya ste /
T02D2523:134b-22: mthe bong gnyis ni bsnol byas la //
T02D2523:134b-23: mdzub mo rtse mo bkug nas ni //
T02D2523:134b-24: gung mo bsnyams pa'i tshigs su sbyar //
T02D2523:134b-25: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang mor bshad //
T02D2523:134b-26: aom bhu kham zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2523:134b-27: aa bhi shi nytsa sva m'am zhes pa dang /
T02D2523:134b-28: de bzhin du aom badzra satva h'um /
T02D2523:134b-29: badzra ratna tr'am: badzra dharma hr'i:/
T02D2523:134b-31: zhes bya ba thams cad la aa bhi shinytsa sva m'am zhes byas la /
T02D2523:134b-32: so so'i phyag rgya dang ldan pas gnas ji lta ba bzhin du dbang bskur ro //
T02D2523:134b-34: zhes bya ba phyag rgya dang bcas pas gnas ji lta ba bzhin du bsrung ba dang /
T02D2523:134b-35: dar dbyangs dang cod pan gyi dbang bskur ba la gnas par bya'o //
T02D2523:134b-36: de nas mnyam pa'i thal mos mnyes par bya ste /
T02D2523:134b-38: de nas sgeg mo la sogs pas mchod par bya'o //
T02D2523:134b-39: de'i rjes su sngags 'dis gser ram rin po che'i
T02D2523:134b-40: thar ma la mig sman bskus la mig dbye bar
T02D2523:134b-41: bya'o// aom tsa kshu sa manta tsakashu bi sho dang ni sv'a h'a /
T02D2523:134b-43: aom di bya ai ni sa m'a dhi dhy'a n'am na nee sv'a h'a /
T02D2523:135a-0: sna tshogs pa la mchod pa'i sngags kyis @135a * //
T02D2523:135a-2: gong du gsungs pa'i bum pa rnams bu mo mdzes
T02D2523:135a-3: pa gzhon nu ma brgyad dam gcig gis mchod par
T02D2523:135a-4: bya'o // de nas la lar slob ma dag gnas pa na yongs su gzung ba'i cho gas /
T02D2523:135a-5: slob ma bsnyen pa rim pa bzhin du dbang bskur la /
T02D2523:135a-7: de'i rjes la yang sreg blugs 'bum du tshang ba'am /
T02D2523:135a-8: yang na brgya rtsa brgyad du bya'o //
T02D2523:135a-9: de la dkyil 'khor gyi lha la ni dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o //
T02D2523:135a-10: gcig la sogs pa rnams la ni sangs rgyas thams cad pa'i yum gyi dkyil 'khor bris la bya'o //
T02D2523:135a-11: de bzhin du gtsug lag khang dang /
T02D2523:135a-12: sku gdung dang glegs bam thams cad la yang sangs
T02D2523:135a-13: rgyas thams cad pa'i yum gyi dkyil 'khor bya ba
T02D2523:135a-14: ste / de yang mchog tu gsang ba'i rgyud las bcom ldan 'das kyis /
T02D2523:135a-16: de yi bsdus pa de nyid do //
T02D2523:135a-17: gzhan du rab gnas thams cad la //
T02D2523:135a-18: sangs rgyas kun yum dkyil 'khor bri //
T02D2523:135a-20: de la sangs rgyas kun gyi yum gyi dkyil 'khor ni /
T02D2523:135a-22: rigs lnga'i bde bar gshegs pa lnga dang /
T02D2523:135a-23: sgo ba dang phyogs skyong du bcas pa'o //
T02D2523:135a-24: gtsug lag khang la ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub
T02D2523:135a-25: sems dpa' dang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang
T02D2523:135a-26: thams cad kyi bzhugs gnas ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs
T02D2523:135a-27: kyi gzhal yas khang chos kyi dbyings ltar yangs par
T02D2523:135a-28: ting nge 'dzin dang sngags 'dis bskyed do //
T02D2523:135a-29: aom h'um hr'i: su pra tishtha badzre sv'a h'a /
T02D2523:135a-30: aom h'um hr'i: bhr'um kham badzr'i bha ba dri dha tishtha bhr'um kham zhes bya'o //
T02D2523:135a-31: de nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i gnas de la bum pa lnga'am /
T02D2523:135a-32: bcu drug la sogs pa'i nang spos chus yangs su
T02D2523:135a-33: gang ba dag la mngon par bsngags pas bsang gtor
T02D2523:135a-35: aom badzra da ka sarba shuddhe bi shuddhe sv'a h'a /
T02D2523:135a-36: de'i rjes la gong ma'i sngags dang ting nge 'dzin
T02D2523:135a-37: gyis bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi ngo
T02D2523:135a-38: bo / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i thams
T02D2523:135b-0: cad kyi @135b dbyings su gyur pa khang pa brtsegs
T02D2523:135b-1: pa chen po 'og min nas bkug ste /
T02D2523:135b-2: ngo bo nyid gcig par rab tu gnas par bya'o //
T02D2523:135b-3: de nas yang mchod pa'i tshogs byas la /
T02D2523:135b-4: gtsug lag khang gi srung ma panytsa ka'am /
T02D2523:135b-5: nag po chen po la sogs pa dgug pa'am /
T02D2523:135b-9: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi sbyor ba dang ldan pas lung bsgo bar bya ste /
T02D2523:135b-10: ji srid gtsug lag khang gnas pa de srid kyi
T02D2523:135b-11: bar du khyod kyis srungs shig /'phags pa'i dge 'dun
T02D2523:135b-12: gyi bka' yang khyod kyis sgrubs shig ces bsgos la
T02D2523:135b-15: de bzhin du 'phags pa'i mchod rten la rab tu gnas pa yang /
T02D2523:135b-16: mchod pa legs par bya zhing bkrus la yi ge bhr'um las rnam par snang mdzad dang /
T02D2523:135b-17: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma yongs su gyur pa las mchod rten gyi gzugs su bskyed cing /
T02D2523:135b-18: de nyid sangs rgyas thams cad kyi skur bsam par bya ste /
T02D2523:135b-19: khrus dang bkra shis dang byin gyis brlab pa dang /
T02D2523:135b-20: sngags la sogs pa cho ga thams cad ni gong
T02D2523:135b-21: du gsungs pa dang mthun par bya ba nyid do
T02D2523:135b-22: // dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam rab tu gnas par bya ba ni /
T02D2523:135b-23: lhag par gnas pa la sogs pa snga ma bzhin du byas la /
T02D2523:135b-24: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yi ge'i rnam par yongs su gyur nas /
T02D2523:135b-25: kun rdzob dang don dam pa ston par byed par bsams la /
T02D2523:135b-26: aom pradzny'a sru tam smri ti ma ti bi dza ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2523:135b-27: zhes pa dang mdo sde la ni /
T02D2523:135b-28: aom s'u tra se na dharma dh'a tu garbhe sv'a h'a /
T02D2523:135b-29: zhes pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi yan lag
T02D2523:135b-30: rgya mtsho'i sgra thams cad bkug ste yi ge rnams
T02D2523:135b-31: la bstims nas / de nyid kyis sems can rnams la chos ston par rab tu gnas par bya'o //
T02D2523:135b-32: gsang sngags kyi rgyud la ni /
T02D2523:135b-33: rdo rje chos yi ge'i gzugs su gyur pas sngags
T02D2523:135b-34: kyi gzugs kyi skrus 'khor ba na 'gro ba ma
T02D2523:135b-35: lus pa'i don mdzad pa dang /
T02D2523:135b-37: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /
T02D2523:136a-1: 'chang thams cad kyis kyang de bzhin du byin gyis brlab par bsams te /
T02D2523:136a-2: aom h'um hr'i: sarba gu hya dh'a tu ta /
T02D2523:136a-3: zhes pas rab tu gnas par bya'o //
T02D2523:136a-4: khrus la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin te /
T02D2523:136a-8: glegs bam la sogs pa ni /
T02D2523:136a-10: mchod pa dang gtor ma'i cho ga la sogs pa ni sngar gsungs pa las shes par bya'o //
T02D2523:136a-11: rdo rje la ni yongs su dag par khrus la sogs pa byas la /
T02D2523:136a-12: lte ba la gnas pa'i h'um las /
T02D2523:136a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje bskyed de /
T02D2523:136a-14: ting nge 'dzin gyis dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs
T02D2523:136a-15: pa thams cad kyi thugs ye shes kyi rdo rje
T02D2523:136a-16: thams cad bkug pa de rnams nam mkha'i dkyil du
T02D2523:136a-17: padma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad pa la gser gyi
T02D2523:136a-18: rdo rje chen po 'od sna tshogs dang ldan pa
T02D2523:136a-19: bsams la / de nyid rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas bkug pa la sogs pa byas la /
T02D2523:136a-20: ngo bo nyid gcig par bsams nas /
T02D2523:136a-21: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta dzny'a na badzra h'um /
T02D2523:136a-22: zhes pas byin gyis brlabs la rab tu gnas par bya zhing /
T02D2523:136a-23: de'i lte ba la rdo rje sems dpa'i bsam par bya'o //
T02D2523:136a-24: dril bu rab tu gnas par bya ba ni /
T02D2523:136a-25: dril bu de aa dkar po las dus gsum gyi
T02D2523:136a-26: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung chos kyi sgra chen
T02D2523:136a-27: por bskyed la / khrus gsol ba byas nas /
T02D2523:136a-28: ting nge 'dzin gyis mdun gyi nam mkha'i bar snang la /
T02D2523:136a-29: padma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i steng du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ljags padma chen po las /
T02D2523:136a-30: gsung gi sgra rgya mtsho ji snyed pas 'gro ba ma lus pa la /
T02D2523:136a-31: dam pa'i chos ston pa dang /
T02D2523:136a-32: dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ma
T02D2523:136a-33: nyes par byed pa'i rin po che dbyig gi dril
T02D2523:136a-35: padma mnyam par 'dus pa las byung ba'i gzugs kha
T02D2523:136a-36: dog dmar po 'od sna tshogs dang ldan pa bsams
T02D2523:136a-37: te / de nyid lcags kyu la sogs pas dgug
T02D2523:136a-38: pa la sogs pa byas nas ngo bo nyid gcig
T02D2523:136a-39: te / pa las / aom sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra dzvi hva aa /
T02D2523:136a-40: zhes pas byin gyis brlab cing /
T02D2523:136b-0: de'i nang du aa las rdo rje bsrung ba kha dog dmar po @136b bsam par bya'o //
T02D2523:136b-1: phreng ba rab tu gnas par bya ba ni /
T02D2523:136b-2: rdo rje la sogs par rigs ji lta bu'i rim pa las shes par bya zhing /
T02D2523:136b-3: de nyid kyang bkru ba la sogs pa byas nas
T02D2523:136b-4: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpar phreng ba'i mdo
T02D2523:136b-5: 'dzin bsams la / rang gi lha'i snying po gang yin pa dang /
T02D2523:136b-6: chos kyi gzungs chen po'i snying po /
T02D2523:136b-7: aom ma h'a padme dha ra ni zhes bya ba'i snying por bskyed de /
T02D2523:136b-8: de nas ting nge 'dzin gyis bcom ldan 'das rdo
T02D2523:136b-9: rje sems dpa' nyid mdun gyi nam mkhar bsams la
T02D2523:136b-10: / de nyid las bsrung ba'i snying po ni /
T02D2523:136b-12: de las rang gi 'dod pa'i lhar bsams nas /
T02D2523:136b-13: de nyid kyi bsrung ba'i sngags kyi yig 'bru rnams 'od zer dang bcas pa byung ba las /
T02D2523:136b-14: dgug pa la sogs pa byas nas /
T02D2523:136b-15: snying po dang yi ge 'bru rnams phreng ba gzhan la bstim /
T02D2523:136b-16: rang gi lha nyid chos kyi gzungs chen por 'gyur ba las /
T02D2523:136b-17: mdo 'dzin la rab tu gnas par byas la /
T02D2523:136b-18: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mi brjed pa'i gzungs su gyur cig ces brjod la /
T02D2523:136b-19: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta mh'a dharm'a aa mri te su pra tishtha badzre h'um /
T02D2523:136b-20: zhes pas rab tu gnas par bya'o ;
T02D2523:136b-21: / rdo rje la sogs pa la ni mchod pa dang /
T02D2523:136b-22: bkra shis la sogs pa ni snga ma ji lta ba bzhin du bya zhing /
T02D2523:136b-23: sku gzugs la sogs pa thams cad la ni /
T02D2523:136b-24: rab tu gnas pa med par ni zhag 'ga' yang gzhag par mi bya ste /
T02D2523:136b-26: gang du sku gzugs zin nas ni //
T02D2523:136b-27: yun rings gnas kyang ma mchod na //
T02D2523:136b-28: ji srid rab tu ma gnas par //
T02D2523:136b-29: de las mi shes skye bar 'gyur //
T02D2523:136b-31: de bas na mkhas pa rnams kyis sems can rnams
T02D2523:136b-32: kyis bsod nams thob par bya ba'i phyir myur du
T02D2523:136b-33: rab tu gnas par bya ba nyid do //
T02D2523:136b-34: de yi yo byad 'di dag ste //
T02D2523:136b-35: gang du rdzas ni nyams pa las //
T02D2523:136b-36: rdo rje slob dpon nyams gyur pas //
T02D2523:136b-37: de bas rdzas la rab tu 'bad //
T02D2523:136b-38: dar dang rna cha gdu bu dang //
T02D2523:136b-39: sor gdub rnams ni gser las byas //
T02D2523:136b-40: de nyid kyi ni gnas kyi phyir//
T02D2523:137a-0: @137a * // nang tshangs can stan khri dang bcas //
T02D2523:137a-1: de bzhin rgyab rten dag dang ni //
T02D2523:137a-2: gos bzang pos ni dgab par bya //
T02D2523:137a-3: sku gzugs la sogs dang por ni //
T02D2523:137a-4: gdan ni shin tu yid 'ong ba //
T02D2523:137a-5: mngon sum bya'am bsams nas ni //
T02D2523:137a-6: de steng bzhugs su gsol bar bya //
T02D2523:137a-7: steng du bla re bre bya zhing //
T02D2523:137a-8: sna tshogs gos la sogs pas brgyan //
T02D2523:137a-9: sa gzhi lhag par gnas bya bar //
T02D2523:137a-10: srad bu thod le kor dang bcas //
T02D2523:137a-11: dkyil 'khor bri bar bya ba'i phyir //
T02D2523:137a-12: dkar dang ser dang dmar dang ljang //
T02D2523:137a-13: de bzhin nag po lnga dang yang //
T02D2523:137a-14: 'dir ni tshon ni bsdu bar gsungs //
T02D2523:137a-15: de la snod ni gang ba brgyad //
T02D2523:137a-16: bzhi'am gang yang yid kyis brtag /'bras dkar gyis ni bkang ba la //
T02D2523:137a-17: dbyig dag dang ni bcas par bya //
T02D2523:137a-18: bsang gtor mchod yon snod nyid dag / zangs ma las byas bum pa dang //
T02D2523:137a-19: so shing so phag dri zhim dang //
T02D2523:137a-20: pir ni dri ma sbyong byed pa //
T02D2523:137a-21: ba gcin lci ba 'o ma dang //
T02D2523:137a-22: zho dang mar sar ku sha'i chun //
T02D2523:137a-23: ba yi rnam lnga mnyam bsags la //
T02D2523:137a-24: snod gcig gi ni nang du gzhug / ljang dang dmar dang de bzhin ser //
T02D2523:137a-25: dkar dang nag po gnyis dag ste /
T02D2523:137a-26: srad bu lnga ni bsgril bar bya //
T02D2523:137a-27: mda' bzhi dag dang yang dag ldan //
T02D2523:137a-28: til mar dri bzangs til mar nyid //
T02D2523:137a-29: sku gzugs sku dang mar me dag / bya ba'i phyir ni dbul bya zhing //
T02D2523:137a-30: me long shin tu dri med bsags //
T02D2523:137a-31: sku gzugs lhag par gnas pa la //
T02D2523:137a-32: ras ser bzang po kha tshar bcas //
T02D2523:137a-33: dri med rnam par dag pa dang //
T02D2523:137a-34: aa gar nag pos legs bdugs pa //
T02D2523:137a-35: ser dang dmar dang nag dang sngo //
T02D2523:137a-36: dkar dang mkha' 'dra sngo ba sangs dang //
T02D2523:137a-37: de bzhin dkar po'i ba dan rnams //
T02D2523:137a-38: phyogs mtshams brgyad du gzugs par bya //
T02D2523:137a-39: dkyil 'khor lha yi grangs las ni //
T02D2523:137a-40: bum pa lhag par gnas bya'am //
T02D2523:137a-41: bcu'am brgyad dam lnga rnams ni //
T02D2523:137a-43: gos bzang sna tshogs mdog can gyis //
T02D2523:137a-44: bum pa'i ma gul pa dkri bar bya //
T02D2523:137b-0: gser ram yang na dngul dag @137b ni ;
T02D2523:137b-1: / dkyil 'khor phyogs su gzhag par bya //
T02D2523:137b-2: bri had kanda ka ri dang //
T02D2523:137b-3: ka ri ka ni sha sa mchog / danda autpala dkar po ste //
T02D2523:137b-4: sman rnams lnga po bsags nas ni //
T02D2523:137b-5: btags te mnyam par sbyar ba yi /
T02D2523:137b-6: sman rnams kun dang ldan pa la //
T02D2523:137b-7: de bzhin gshegs sngags bzlas nas ni //
T02D2523:137b-8: bum pa rnams su'ang gzhug par bya //
T02D2523:137b-9: rdo rje mthon ka bee d'urya //
T02D2523:137b-10: padma r'a ga rdo rje ste //
T02D2523:137b-11: 'di dag rin chen mchog gyur yin //
T02D2523:137b-12: med na tha mal pa yis bya //
T02D2523:137b-13: aa mu bil ba se'u star ga dang //
T02D2523:137b-14: gla gor zho sha dz'a ti dang //
T02D2523:137b-15: de la sogs pa gzhan rnams ni //
T02D2523:137b-16: sna tshogs sman ni dbul bar bya //
T02D2523:137b-17: 'bras yos bzang po dag dang ni //
T02D2523:137b-18: yungs kar bzang po so sor dbul //
T02D2523:137b-19: zho mar 'o ma sbrang rtsi dang //
T02D2523:137b-20: 'o ma can shing shing la sogs //
T02D2523:137b-21: me tog le brgan rtsi dag dang //
T02D2523:137b-22: bag zan las byas snum khur mchog / spyan 'byed kyi ni yo byad de //
T02D2523:137b-23: de dag so sor dbul bar bya //
T02D2523:137b-24: de bzhin khrus sa'i stegs bur ni //
T02D2523:137b-25: rin chen las byas khrus gzhong dang //
T02D2523:137b-26: so shing so phag phye ma dang //
T02D2523:137b-27: phag ze d'ur ba'i pir dag dang //
T02D2523:137b-28: ba yi rnams lnga cha mnyam dang //
T02D2523:137b-29: skyu ru la sogs 'dag cha la chu //
T02D2523:137b-30: sbrang rtsi dang sbyar mngar gsum chu //
T02D2523:137b-31: dri dang 'o ma'i chu rnams ni //
T02D2523:137b-32: bum pa re re dag tu bya //
T02D2523:137b-33: zhal long sku phyis ras yug dang //
T02D2523:137b-34: gu gul la sogs spos rnams dang //
T02D2523:137b-35: seng ldeng phur bu sngags gos dang //
T02D2523:137b-36: tshon skud lnga dang 'dab bzhi dang //
T02D2523:137b-37: tshon sna lnga yi phye ma dang //
T02D2523:137b-38: sbrang chu sug pa spos chu dang //
T02D2523:137b-39: til mar dang ni sran phye dang //
T02D2523:137b-40: 'bras chan chang bu gnyis dag dang //
T02D2523:137b-41: lha yi grangs dang rab sbyar ba'i //
T02D2523:137b-42: gur gum gyis bris lha yi mtshan //
T02D2523:137b-43: bris la bum pa gzhag par bya //
T02D2523:137b-44: gser las byas pa'i spu gri dang //
T02D2523:137b-45: de bzhin so mangs smad tsher dang ;
T02D2523:137b-46: / shel sgong dris bsgos rna cha dang //
T02D2523:137b-47: gser las byas pa'i thur ma dang //
T02D2523:137b-48: gser gyi 'khor lo dar dbyangs dang //
T02D2523:137b-49: gdugs dang rnga ma mchod pa'i tshogs //
T02D2523:137b-50: seng ge'i khri dang ku sha dang //
T02D2523:137b-51: de bzhin yo byad ldan pa yis //
T02D2523:137b-52: rab tu gnas byas shis par 'gyur //
T02D2523:138a-2: mtshan mi shes pa'i lha rnams ni //
T02D2523:138a-3: rab tu gnas par byed pa ni //
T02D2523:138a-4: the tshom gyur pas gzhag bya min //
T02D2523:138a-5: de bzhin gshegs kun sangs rgyas kyi //
T02D2523:138a-6: thugs kyi ngo bo rdo rje sems //
T02D2523:138a-7: yin pas gsal bar mi 'gyur bas //
T02D2523:138a-8: rdo rje sems dpa' rab gnas bya'o //
T02D2523:138a-9: de bzhin gshegs kun rab gnas pa'i //
T02D2523:138a-10: cho ga dri med byas pa las //
T02D2523:138a-11: bsod nams cung zad gang thob des //
T02D2523:138a-12: 'gro ba'i nyes kun dag gyur cig / rab tu
T02D2523:138a-13: gnas pa'i cho ga slob dpon chen po kun dga'
T02D2523:138a-14: snying pos mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D2523:138a-17: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po shraddh'a ka ra wa rma dang //
